movies.title: Amsterdamned
movies.plot: A mysterious diver hiding in Amsterdam's canal system embarks on a rampage of gruesome murders, terrifying city officials and leaving few clues for the city's best detective, who doesn't suspect that both his new girlfriend and twelve-year-old daughter may be closer than he is to finding the killer.
movies.simplePlot: A mysterious diver hiding in Amsterdam's canal system embarks on a rampage of gruesome murders, terrifying city officials and leaving few clues for the city's best detective, who doesn't ...

biography.bio: Huub Stapel was born on December 2, 1954 in Tegelen, Limburg, Netherlands as Hubertus Wijnandus Jozef Marie Stapel. He is an actor, known for Paradis express (1997), Amsterdamned (1988) and The Lift (1983). He has been married to Resie Jansen since December 2, 2004. They have two children.
biography.name: Huub Stapel

biography.birthName: Monica Maria Theresia van de Ven
biography.bio: Monique van de Ven was born on July 28, 1952 in Zeeland, Noord-Brabant, Netherlands as Monica Maria Theresia van de Ven. She is an actress and director, known for Spangen (1999), Turkish Delight (1973) and Dokter Deen (2012). She has been married to Edwin de Vries since 1991. They have two children. She was previously married to Jan de Bont.
biography.name: Monique van de Ven

biography.bio: Serge-Henri Valcke was born on June 30, 1946 in Ieper, Belgium. He is an actor and set decorator, known for Baantjer (1995), No Man's Land (2001) and In de Vlaamsche pot (1990).
biography.name: Serge-Henri Valcke

biography.bio: Hidde Maas was born on July 29, 1944 in Groenekan, Utrecht, Netherlands as Jan Hidde Maas. He is an actor, known for Spijkerhoek (1989), Amsterdamned (1988) and Stronghold (1985).
biography.name: Hidde Maas

biography.bio: Wim Zomer was born on February 22, 1945 in Finsterwolde, Groningen, Netherlands. He is an actor, known for Amsterdamned (1988), De graaf van Monte Cristo (1972) and Spijkerhoek (1989).
biography.name: Wim Zomer

biography.bio: Tanneke Hartzuiker was born on August 23, 1955 in Hilversum, Noord-Holland, Netherlands as Taetske Maria Hartzuiker. She is an actress, known for Familie Oudenrijn (1987), Amsterdamned (1988) and Dücker en Oudenrijn (1991).
biography.name: Tanneke Hartzuiker

biography.bio: Lou Landré was born on November 20, 1939 in the Netherlands as Guillaume Louis Frédéric Landré. He is an actor, known for Flodder (1993), Karakter (1997) and Leak 2000 (2000).
biography.name: Lou Landré

biography.bio: Tatum Dagelet was born on February 25, 1975 in Amsterdam, Noord-Holland, Netherlands. She is an actress, known for Amsterdamned (1988), For a Lost Soldier (1992) and Fort Alpha (1996). She was previously married to Ruud de Wild.
biography.name: Tatum Dagelet

biography.bio: Edwin Bakker is known for his work on Black Book (2006), Deuce Bigalow: European Gigolo (2005) and An American Werewolf in Paris (1997).
biography.name: Edwin Bakker

biography.bio: Pieter Lutz was born on August 13, 1927 in Delft, Zuid-Holland, Netherlands as Petrus Gerardus Lutz. He was an actor, known for Laat maar zitten (1988), The Lift (1983) and Lang leve de koningin (1995). He was married to Yvonne Lutz-Van Elburg. He died on August 20, 2009 in Rotterdam, Zuid-Holland.
biography.name: Pieter Lutz

biography.bio: Barbara Martijn is a casting director and producer, known for Dag juf, tot morgen (1995), Amsterdamned (1988) and Frank Martinus Arion (2014).
biography.name: Barbara Martijn

biography.bio: Door van Boeckel was born on February 19, 1952 in Lier, Flanders, Belgium. He is an actor, known for Booh! (2005), Amsterdamned (1988) and Skilz (2011).
biography.name: Door van Boeckel

biography.bio: Simone Ettekoven was born on August 27, 1948 in Bilthoven, Utrecht, Netherlands. She is an actress, known for Amsterdamned (1988), Het Debuut (1977) and Bloedverwanten (1977).
biography.name: Simone Ettekoven

biography.bio: Koos van der Knaap was born on October 22, 1950 in Naaldwijk, Zuid-Holland, Netherlands as Jacobus Jozef van der Knaap. He is an actor, known for Toen was geluk heel gewoon (1994), Amsterdamned (1988) and Yes Nurse! No Nurse! (2002).
biography.name: Koos van der Knaap

biography.bio: Pieter Loef is an actor, known for Amsterdamned (1988), Allemaal Tuig (1981) and Mijn idee: Verdacht (1988).
biography.name: Pieter Loef
